author: Syropoulos, Silvestros, active 15th century
title: Vera historia unionis non veræ inter Græcos et Latinos, sive concilii Florentini exactissima narratio, Græcè scripta per Sylvestrvm Sgvropvlvm ... Transtulit in sermonem Latinum, notasque ad calcem libri adjecit ... Caroli Secvndi ... Robertus Creyghton .
